meanings.definition: A complete set of locks for a door or other object.
meanings.sent1: The lockset on the front door includes a doorknob, deadbolt, and latch.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to install a new lockset when upgrading your home security.
meanings.sent3: The lockset on the treasure chest was so intricate that even the pirates couldn't open it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complex lockset, with each memory guarded by a different key.
meanings.sent5: The lockset on the gate clicked shut, sealing off the garden from intruders.
